name: Nipto
0:
”Alexa tell nipto assistant that Elodie just took the trash out”
”Alexa ask nipto assistant what is the current score”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nipto assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Nipto organizes a game in your couple, your family or your roommate to better divide the household chores.

By doing these household chores, players accumulate points throughout the week. The winner is chosen every Sunday evening and can get a reward. The counters are then reset and a new week of competition begins.

Nipto also involves your children, whose accounts you can manage and customize the points goal.

Competition for some, teamwork for others, Nipto makes sharing household chores fun and friendly. No more debates about who does the most housework! 

You will also be able to : 
- Personalize household chores,
- Choose your favourite game mode, competition or personal goal,
- See the participation of each player,
- Reward the winners,
- Add reminders for important household chores,
- Offering a bonus of points as a thank you.
